name: Hentai Swimming Club
description:
Girls in bikinis and in swimsuits! Strip Games. At your disposal there are 7 girls who want to bare their bodies for your look. Show iron logic, patience, ingenuity for victory in mini-games that will allow you to see the most beautiful thing in a girl.
7 girls, each has a unique character, and a unique appearance that will not let you get bored, enthralling dialogues, interesting games, and growing complexity.
Play with one hand and conquer the maidens.

features:
- 7 girls in bikini.
- 2 mini-games : puzzle and rotate game.
- Relaxing soundtrack.
- 3 stages undressing girls.
